title: 2019-05-12 - Lime Downloader v4.2
plain_text:
# Lime Downloader v4.2

**github.com/NYAN-x-CAT/Lime-Downloader**

NYAN-x-CAT

It's a loader that download your payload and run it on memory without dropping it to disk and
also without crypt payload.


-----

## Main Features

.NET - Coded in Visual Basic & C#, required framework 4.0 dependency.

Dropless - No file drop to disk

Multi - Insert more than 1 link

## Prerequisites

To open project you need:

1- Visual Studio 2015+

2- This repository

## Author

**NYAN CAT**
